actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to permit the vessel Manatra II to be inspected, licensed, and operated as a passenger-carrying vessel, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs that a named vessel shall be inspected, licensed, and operated as a passenger-carrying vessel subject to specified limitations and restrictions so long as it remains under the continuous ownership of a named association.

titles.title: A bill to permit the vessel Manatra II to be inspected, licensed, and operated as a passenger-carrying vessel, and for other purposes.
